description: This source file defines API routes for managing and retrieving test run history in a FastAPI application, including endpoints for listing run history with filtering and pagination, and retrieving details for specific runs.

methods.name: get_history( case_id: Optional[str] = Query(None), status: Optional[str] = Query(None), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Fetches paginated and optionally filtered list of test run history entries.

methods.name: get_run_details( run_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific test run identified by run_id.
